title: Success Is a Sure Thing, Failure Is Not!
originalTitle: Success Is a Sure Thing, Failure Is Not!

examples: From your conversations with him, could you ascertain whether he did believe in a delay?

words.defineEn: to discover and verify a fact or a piece of information
words.defineVi: để khám phá và xác minh một thực tế hoặc một mẩu thông tin

words.defineEn: a thing that is essential or desired

examples: They will be completely flummoxed that this happened.

examples: This is a critical juncture where you have the power to stop your descent.

examples: Kate was in a quandary for the last two weeks.

words.defineVi: một trạng thái bối rối hoặc không chắc chắn về cách tiến hành trong một tình huống khó khăn
